## A Little About Me

After getting a PhD in mathematics at UCLA, I spent several years in academia before becoming interested in machine learning.
In particular, I want to see what practical insights and advancements mathematics can bring to the machine learning world.
You can read more detailed information about me [here](about.qmd).
